item.title: Suspect arrested in Charlie Kirk killing confessed to father, officials say
item.description: A person has been arrested in connection with the shooting that killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk, sources said.

item.title: Qatar prime minister meeting U.S. officials after Israeli attack on Hamas leaders in Doha
item.description: The prime minister of Qatar is in Washington, D.C. on Friday to discuss Tuesday's Israeli attack on Hamas leaders who were in Doha. CBS News' Imtiaz T...

item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect is in custody. Here's what we know.
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was shot and killed on Wednesday while speaking an event at Utah Valley University.

item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect in custody after manhunt, officials announce
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk died Wednesday after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University. Officials say a suspect is now in custody.

item.title: Officials say Charlie Kirk shooting suspect arrested after he confessed to dad | Special Report
item.description: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox, FBI Director Kash Patel and other officials announced the suspect in the assassination of Charlie Kirk was arrested on Thursday...
